Text: Hi, I've  been trying to download smash ep 14 & 15 for over 5hrs, but its not working...so can u please upload them to hulkshare? I would really appreciate it if u did!

You should ask earlier. Now, I seed both mp4 (just mp4 from season pack).
If you are member of Sceneunderground site, grab my season torrent from there and take eps you need.
But - now I seed both episodes both here and there.

Thanks for offering this!  Love the series. The US remake of it was surprisingly good too.

How do I get an invite to SceneUnderground?

@chuckbrow: I can send you one. You need gmail account and send me a message on my gmail you can find here in older torrent-descriptions of my uploads, like on Page 30 (I am not repeating it to avoid spam). Or you can use Tweeter and send it to #twentyforty1.
